Version 2.0.88 - Fix Stale localStorage Causing Wrong Position Counter

Bug Fixes

  • Fix stale localStorage causing wrong position counter: computeFurthestFromApi() and initial retry loop now always read from DB and use Math.max with existing value instead of skipping when furthestSlide is already set
  • Remove furthestSlide !== null early-return guards that prevented DB comparison when localStorage had a stale value
  • All three code paths (defineProperty trap, retry loop DB read, retry loop computation) now consistently use Math.max to reconcile localStorage vs DB values

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.87: Enforce 8-flow behavior for all SCORM vendors; fix tag navigation progress inflation and resume position bar drop
  • v2.0.86: Always set defineProperty traps; compute furthestSlide in trap; reduce vendor delays
  • v2.0.85: Fix resume correction suspend_data in LMSInitialize wrapper
  • v2.0.84: Fix Captivate position bar bugs (Generic 0-based misread)
